title: Restoration Station Mini Mellow with Mischa
description: Get comfortable and achieve deep relaxation in this traditional restorative practise.

title: Take The Edge Off Mini Mellow with Matt
description: A gentle hip-opening class to help reduce the rushing, strained energy that comes with the Vata dosha.

title: Nervous System Balancing Mellow with Mischa
description: Creating balance through hips releasing tension.

title: Low Flow Unified with Lucienne
description: Ground back into your body and reconnect with Self

title: Settle Yourself Yoga Nidra with Hayley
description: Experience the power of gentle breathwork, yoga nidra, and Shavasana as Hayley guides you into deep relaxation.

title: Deep Rest Yoga Nidra with Mischa
description: A deep pause to unwind the body, mind and nervous system in times of stress or create a pre sleep ritual. Float on the cloud of Yoga Nidra.

title: Sleep Support Meditation with Rose
description: A short guided meditation focusing on the breath, 'switching' off the body and regulating the nervous system to prepare for sleep.

title: The Hum
description: We use a combination of 7.83hz and 40hz and being submersed in these frequencies helps you to naturally produce matching frequencies.
